title: RAG Intelligence Matrix
subtitle: Knowledge Retrieval & Analysis

protocol_guide: The RAG Matrix follows the 'Secure-Ingest' protocol. Data is chunked semantically and stored in a persistent local vector space for rapid retrieval across sessions.

title: Sovereign Security Governance
subtitle: Automated Policy & Identity Control

protocol_guide: The Governance Layer implements 'Zero-Trust' orchestration. Every tool call is intercepted and validated against the internal security policy before the Neural Core can commit the execution.

title: Industrial Recon Protocols

protocol_guide: Recon protocols prioritize 'Stealth-First' execution. Scans are randomized and throttled to avoid triggering IDS/IPS systems while maintaining high-fidelity results.

title: Advanced Exploitation Engine

protocol_guide: Exploitation follows the 'Validate-Then-Execute' protocol. No exploit is launched without a verified vulnerability match to ensure mission stability.
